content: The full Yaksha Outrage Set of Armor and Gear is located within Chapter 5 - Flaming Mountains. It is craftable at any Shrine upon defeating the Yaksha King and completing the chapter. Rest at the next Shrine to craft it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yaksha_Outrage_Set.md', within the main section titled 'Yaksha Outrage Set'.
The content is as follows:
The full Yaksha Outrage Set of Armor and Gear is located within Chapter 5 - Flaming Mountains. It is craftable at any Shrine upon defeating the Yaksha King and completing the chapter. Rest at the next Shrine to craft it.
